description:
USE 8185551212 TO SEE DEMO RESTAURANT MENU AND ORDERING FUNCTIONS.

fóntagg feast is a new category of mobile menu, online ordering, socializing, and multi-player gaming app for iPhone, iPod, and iPad devices, made possible by the member restaurants of taggtogo service.

It is fully customizable by restaurants, cafes, night clubs, and other subscribers.

IMPORTANT: If you are not downloading this app from a member restaurant’s web site, simply  search for restaurants near you, select your favorite, and see if the restaurant is a member.

To load the menu and custom features and menu of a restaurant, download the app, start the app, and enter the restaurant’s 10-digit phone number (numbers only).

Make sure you have a 3G or Wi-Fi connection.  Once the app configures itself, you’re ready to:

•  Click-to-call the restaurant
•  Peruse the menu
•  Place orders

fóntagg feast makes it possible to place takeout orders while  driving to the restaurant, and pick up your order when you arrive.  

You can also place delivery orders from anywhere now, and if you are sitting in the restaurant, enter your table number and the food will be delivered to you.

But there is more to fóntagg feast then meets the eye.  Connect to the restaurant or bar's Wi-Fi and start socializing with others in the bar.
•  Learn about people near you
•  Chat with them
•  Play games with them
•  VIRTUALLY INTERACT WITH THEM as only iPhone will allow you

If you are a restaurant or club owner:

Simply sign up to our taggtogo online ordering service and start interacting with your customers through your own custom iPhone application.

This app allows your customers to find your restaurant, and interact with you from anywhere, at any time.  Offer your customer the ability to:

•  Place a takeout or delivery orders right from the iPhone
•  Click-to-call your restaurant
•  Look through your menu and place orders from anywhere
•  Associate your restaurant with fun social interaction

This will increase your sales as well as customer satisfaction.  
No more lost sales because your restaurant's phone is busy!
releaseNotes:
